alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:20AM CDT until June 29 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM MDT/500 AM CDT/ FOR NORTHWESTERN THOMAS AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 320 AM MDT/420 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Goodland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 313 AM MDT the Goodland airport reported 60 mph winds. At 319 AM MDT NWS employees reported 1.25 inch diameter hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Goodland, Brewster and Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 17 and 46. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
